Text: Is this really bdrip ? coz the resolution is 1080x800 and it says that "This is an upload from Dutch Movie Theater"
@STEC0 See the aspect ratio 2.40 That means the the TRUE HD is 1080x800 not 1080. Why would you want to encode the black bars top and bottom.

The resolution is 1920x800. The aspect ratio is 2.40:1, so this is a fullHD movie (1080P). NLUPPER002 keep up the good work! It's great to have a dutch uploader who brings us this great movies, with exellent quality!

Oftwel, ga zo door NLUPPER! Hoop nog veel van je te mogen downloaden (en seeden natuurlijk). Geweldig werk.
